title: evening_temperature_humidity_record
summary: Evening temperature and humidity measurement recorded using digital thermometer.
description: This image documents an evening environmental measurement recorded at MaMeeFarm using a digital thermometer-hygrometer device. The recorded temperature is 21.7 degrees Celsius and relative humidity is 63 percent at 18:56 local time.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
